Thursday, March 16, 2006

Hardware setup behind the Robot Co-op

Posted by marcel

The Robot Co-op’s umbrella of Rails apps, including 43 Things and 43 Places, has become one of the poster children of large scale Rails applications in production. For all those wondering how they are scaling to 2.5 million requests/day, Eric Hodel has posted a breakdown of their hardware setup.
